title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item for the first time in library outline view
description:
Description: When using the library outline view, it is not possible to select any item for the first time.

OB: No item can be selected in the library outline view for the first attempt.

EB: Users should be able to select any item in the library outline view on the first try.

SR: 
1. Add a label to a library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item.
